Text: DRAFT PRESS RELEASE AEP Completes Purchase of Houston pipe Line Company From Enronis a draft press release regarding the completion of AEPs purchase of HPL This transaction is expected to close today Friday June and the release would follow the completion of the deal Please review and return any comments to me at your earliest convenience Eric
